original_title: Poker Brain: Inside the Minds of the World's Best Liars
overview: In the game of poker, it is often impossible to decipher another players' emotions or intentions, hence the term "poker faced." But that's about to change. This entertaining film takes viewers into the minds of the world's best players using state-of-the-art computer analysis, theories of human expression, and expert commentary. Can it help you win millions in Las Vegas gambling casinos?
title: Poker Brain: Inside the Minds of the World's Best Liars
